outputs.output_descr: The main output for UN support includes:  (i) contribution to National Development Plan/Poverty Reduction Strategy and other plans(ii)aid coordination and management(iii)efforts to align UN programme cycle with national development cycle, that is the implementation of the UN Development Framework of Assistance and the Monitoring and Evaluation framework (iv)preparation and implementation of new Joint Programmes(v)strengthening national systems /capacities through the Harmonised Aproach to Cash Transfer(vi)incorporation of gender equality in national planning processes(vii)establishment of Joint UN Team on AIDS and implementation of joint programme of support on AIDS and support to the national response(viii)application of Human Rights Base Approach and strengthening the capacity of UN Country Teams to support national human rights protection systems.

donor_name: UNITED NATIONS DEVELOPMENT FUND FOR WOME
outputs.output_descr: The main output is building and strengthening the capacity of the UN Country Team Coordination through recruitment of appropriate staff and trraining

project_descr: Strengthening UN Country Team Capacities and Results
